TextBlock.Text: MENTH: This is some kind of device. And...maybe...

MENTH: In any case, it seems we had no use for them. When I touched this, I received a report that the Vessel's core had returned to normal. In other words, it's probably some kind of authentication device.
MENTH: We probably didn't help what this person wanted to do. However, someday someone who matches that request will be summoned here.
MENTH: I'm not sure if this is the right thing to mention. However, just as this device interfered with warp, perhaps a powerful warp core could be used to disrupt it.
MENTH: My intuition is that everything will be decided in this next section. Good luck.
